name: Concert Ticket Bot
description: Automates concert ticket searching and booking. Includes scraping, notifications, and purchase automation.

name: Humanizer
description: Library for converting numbers, dates, and times into human-readable formats.

name: Ascii Art Converter
description: Tool to convert images into ASCII art. Supports multiple formats and output styles.

name: Music Recommendation Site
description: Full-stack web application with user authentication, Spotify API integration, and social features. Features include album browsing, user favorites, comment systems, admin dashboard, and automated data fetching via Python scripts.

name: Visit2Malaysia Tourism Portal
description: Comprehensive tourism website promoting Malaysian destinations. Built with modern web technologies and includes detailed documentation and project reports demonstrating full development lifecycle.

name: WIND-RIDER ADVERTISING
description: Professional business advertisement website showcasing services and company information. Features modern design, responsive layout, and effective marketing presentation.

name: Dynamic Portfolio Website
description: Modern, responsive portfolio featuring dynamic color themes, animated gradients, and glassmorphism effects. Built with Tailwind CSS and vanilla JavaScript for optimal performance and aesthetic appeal.

name: Capydon
description: A fun and interactive mini game inspired by the trending popularity of capybaras and classic food and beverage games like Papa's Pizzeria. With a playful twist of a donut shop, it combines cute graphics animation with engaging gameplay.
